name: A Cube's Journey
description:
Sorry about the City stage bugging out and the jump breaking in the cave, the layers messed up on upload.

 Based on - "Wandering for Eternity" .  This game was produced in 48 hours for a Gamejam, Two of us worked on the majority of the game but a  friend also helped with some pixel art. It is a Platformer / slightly puzzle game.
